name: 大学英语四级词汇
description: 包含大学英语四级考试中常见的核心词汇

words.example: She would never abandon her children.
words.exampleTranslation: 她绝不会抛弃她的孩子。

words.example: He has the ability to explain difficult concepts clearly.
words.exampleTranslation: 他有能力清晰地解释复杂概念。

words.example: She's been living abroad for five years now.
words.exampleTranslation: 她已经在国外生活了五年了。

words.example: He was absent from school yesterday because he was sick.
words.exampleTranslation: 他昨天因病没有去学校。

words.example: I have absolute confidence in his ability.
words.exampleTranslation: 我对他的能力有绝对的信心。

words.example: Plants absorb carbon dioxide from the air.
words.exampleTranslation: 植物从空气中吸收二氧化碳。

words.example: The painting is quite abstract and open to interpretation.
words.exampleTranslation: 这幅画相当抽象，可以有多种解读。

words.example: She has pursued an academic career in psychology.
words.exampleTranslation: 她在心理学领域追求学术事业。

words.example: The car began to accelerate as it went downhill.
words.exampleTranslation: 汽车下坡时开始加速。

words.example: I gratefully accept your offer of help.
words.exampleTranslation: 我感谢地接受你的帮助。

words.example: Students have access to the university library.
words.exampleTranslation: 学生可以使用大学图书馆。

words.example: He was involved in a car accident last month.
words.exampleTranslation: 他上个月卷入了一场车祸。

words.example: The hotel can accommodate up to 500 guests.
words.exampleTranslation: 这家酒店可以容纳多达500位客人。

words.example: I'll accompany you to the doctor's office.
words.exampleTranslation: 我会陪你去医生办公室。

words.example: She has accomplished all the goals she set for herself.
words.exampleTranslation: 她已经完成了她为自己设定的所有目标。

words.example: I need to check my bank account balance.
words.exampleTranslation: 我需要查看我的银行账户余额。

words.example: Please provide accurate information on the form.
words.exampleTranslation: 请在表格上提供准确的信息。

words.example: She worked hard to achieve her goals.
words.exampleTranslation: 她努力工作以实现自己的目标。

words.example: He acknowledged that he had made a mistake.
words.exampleTranslation: 他承认自己犯了一个错误。

words.example: She acquired the skill through years of practice.
words.exampleTranslation: 她通过多年的练习获得了这项技能。
